History drug alcohol abuse past 2 year 5 . Regular alcohol consumption , male > 21 unit per week female > 14 unit per week ( 1 unit = Â½ pint beer , 25 mL 40 % spirit 125 mL glass wine ) 6 . Current smoker smoke within last 12 month . A breath carbon monoxide ( CO ) reading great 10 ppm screen 7 . Serious adverse reaction serious hypersensitivity drug formulation excipients eg lactose contraindication cholestyramine/Questran 14 .
